database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: The use of ubiquitin lysine mutants to characterize E2-E3 linkage specificity: mass spectrometry offers a cautionary 'tail'
entry.description: RAW MS data and analysis files for Hong et al. 2015. MS analysis of in vitro auto-ubiquitylation assays to characterize the linkage specificity of 12 different E2-E3 combinations.
